title: How do i change my paypal account
body: I saved my old paypal info ( email and password ) 2 league so it would  automatically just let me go and pay but now i have a new one and idk how to change it. It wont let me :( plz plz plz help ( someone knows how to change or unlink it that would help 2 )

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
